thread.title: Mnet Confirms BoA As New MC For Second Season Of “Produce 101”
thread.title_full: Mnet Confirms BoA As New MC For Second Season Of “Produce 101”

author: choralee
title: Mnet Confirms BoA As New MC For Second Season Of “Produce 101”
text:
Shares 947 Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
BoA will be taking over Jang Geun Suk ‘s role in the second season of “Produce 101.” 
Mnet announced the news on February 23, confirming that BoA will be the new MC for the second season, which is scheduled to air sometime during the first half of next year. 
Similar to the first season, “Produce 101” season two will be featuring 101 male trainees from a variety of agencies. During the show, the public becomes a “national producer” and selects the debut members, the concept, the debut song, and the group name. 
BoA will be acting as a messenger and a representative of the viewers as she will be revealing the voting results during the second season of “Produce 101.” The singer shared her thoughts about joining the show through the production team, saying, “I’m glad to be a part of ‘Produce 101’ season two, a show that has been receiving a lot of attention.” 
Meanwhile, Mnet’s second season of “Produce 101” is set to air during the first half of the coming year.
